structured.description: And loads environment variables using the `dotenv` package, generates a random secret key for JWT authentication, and creates a `Settings` class that retrieves configuration values from the environment or provides default values if they are not set. The `Settings` class is then instantiated to provide access to these configuration values.

items.description: Retrieves environment variables and sets default values if not provided, defining various settings such as JWT secret key, PostgreSQL connection details (user, password, server, port, database), and a constructed DATABASE_URL string.

attributes.name: JWT_SECRET_KEY
attributes.description: Generated as a default value when not provided by environment variable `JWT_SECRET_KEY`.

attributes.name: CHEF_USERNAME
attributes.description: Assigned a default value of "chef" if no environment variable named "CHEF_USERNAME" is set.

attributes.name: JWT_VERIFY_SIGNATURE
attributes.description: Set to the value obtained from the environment variable `JWT_VERIFY_SIGNATURE`. If not present, it defaults to None. This variable likely determines whether or not to verify the signature in JSON Web Tokens (JWTs).

attributes.name: POSTGRES_USER
attributes.description: Set to a default value of "admin" if the environment variable "POSTGRES_USER" is not provided, otherwise it takes the value of the provided environment variable.

attributes.name: POSTGRES_PASSWORD
attributes.description: Set by default to a hardcoded string "password". It can be overridden by setting the environment variable `POSTGRES_PASSWORD`.

attributes.name: POSTGRES_SERVER
attributes.description: Set to the value of the environment variable `POSTGRES_SERVER`. If this variable is not defined, it defaults to "localhost".

attributes.name: POSTGRES_PORT
attributes.description: Used to store the port number for PostgreSQL database connection. It defaults to 5432 if not provided as environment variable.

attributes.name: POSTGRES_DB
attributes.description: Assigned a value that is retrieved from an environment variable named "POSTGRES_DB". If this variable is not set, it defaults to the string "restaurant".

attributes.name: DATABASE_URL
attributes.description: Generated based on environment variables. It represents a PostgreSQL connection string, formatted as "postgresql://user:password@host:port/dbname", with default values for user, password, host, port, and database name if environment variables are not provided.

items.name: Settings
